bug.summary: No Background Map in the HTML File saved with .to_file in Pydeck
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
When I try with the example code of Pydeck the map I got with .show() in Jupyter notebook is normal with mapbox background map while if I use .to_file to save it as HTML file, I cannot see background mapbox map layer in the HTML file <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run the code below Inspect the browser output Code import pydeck as pdk import pandas as pd from vega_datasets import data as vds import ipywidgets from palettable.cartocolors.sequential import BrwnYl_3 import json MAPBOX_API_KEY ="############### data = '<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/groundhogday321/dataframe-datasets/master/fake_commute_data.csv>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/groundhogday321/dataframe-datasets/master/fake_commute_data.csv</denchmark-link> ' commute_pattern = pd.read_csv(data) print(commute_pattern.head(2)) view = pdk.ViewState(latitude=32.800382, longitude=-97.040728, pitch=50, zoom=9) arc_layer = pdk.Layer('ArcLayer', data=commute_pattern, get_source_position=['from_lon', 'from_lat'], get_target_position=['to_lon', 'to_lat'], get_width=5, get_tilt=15, # RGBA colors (red, green, blue, alpha) get_source_color=[255, 165, 0, 80], get_target_color=[128, 0, 128, 80]) arc_layer_map = pdk.Deck(map_style='mapbox://styles/mapbox/light-v10', layers=arc_layer, initial_view_state=view, mapbox_key=MAPBOX_API_KEY) arc_layer_map.to_html(r'############\arc_layer_map.html') arc_layer_map.show() <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Expect there is normal background mapbox map layer in the html I generate with above code. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Map in the HTML file <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74434554/99148903-d8d34980-268a-11eb-8c9a-1053f067aeb5.png></denchmark-link>
Map in the Notebook <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74434554/99148913-ec7eb000-268a-11eb-85e8-1e26c800f589.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
No <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
None <denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
Python version: 3.7.2 OS version: Windows 10 Browser version: Chrome 79.0.3945.117
